_header: Christ unto his disciples dear / Told this tale…
_description: Gospel for the Saturday following the 15th Sunday after Trinity, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle — in couplets

BLHar4196.First Lines: Crist vnto his desciples dereTald þis tale on þis manere…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …Grete ioy was made by morn & noneOf dedes þat by him war done
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “DIcebat ihesus crist turbis similitudinem.”
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): III.128-131.
